blocks.name: ax-xrssca
blocks.content: Assume the scalar component of the extended real structure is the field of the real numbers (this has to be defined in the main body of set.mm). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: ax-xrsvsca
blocks.content: Assume the scalar product of the extended real structure is the extended real number multiplication operation (this has to be defined in the main body of set.mm). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: xrs0
blocks.content: The zero of the extended real numbers. The extended real is not a group, as its addition is not associative. (cf. ~ xaddass and ~ df-xrs ), however it has a zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrs0() {

  xrsbas()
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cxad, cfv(cplusg, cxrs)))
  xrsadd()
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat0, cxr))
  0xr()
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(nat0, cxad, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  xaddid2(cv(hs0))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cxad, nat0), cv(hs0)))
  xaddid1(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxrs)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
}

blocks.name: xrslt
blocks.content: The "strictly less than" relation for the extended real structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: xrsinvgval
blocks.content: The inversion operation in the extended real numbers. The extended real is not a group, as its addition is not associative. (cf. ~ xaddass and ~ df-xrs ), however it has an inversion operation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:

  eqid(cfv(cminusg, cxrs))
